# AI Unfiltered - Full Article List

> This file contains recent AI news articles for consumption by LLMs and AI agents.
> Updated every 4 hours. Links to original sources.


## 2026-01-22

### YIYUAN longevity Raises roughly $5-7 million in Angel Round to Build Quantifiable Anti-Aging Services
- Source: Pandaily
- Category: chinese-ai
- URL: https://pandaily.com/yiyuan-longevity-raises-roughly-5-7-million-in-angel-round-to-build-quantifiable-anti-aging-services
- Summary: Longevity startup YIYUAN LONGEVITY has raised tens of millions in angel funding to commercialize its quantifiable anti-aging service system, which includes a proprietary oxygen chamber and a “1+N” health consultant model.

- Summary: Researchers from Tsinghua University have open-sourced ‘Project-Instinct,’ a modular framework enabling humanoid robots to perform instinctive, high-dynamic movements like parkour and hiking over complex terrain.

## 2026-01-15

- Source: HF Daily Papers
